SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.mx

Class DaneMain

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mx.DaneMain
public class DaneMain extends Object
DANE CLI tool for checking TLSA records.

Provides command-line interface for DANE TLSA record lookups and validation.

See Also:
  • RFC 7672 - DANE for SMTP
  • RFC 6698 - DANE TLSA
